channel.title: Comments on: Being In The Middle Of The Pack Is The Worst

item.description: [...] in 99% of computers worldwide. Instead, Srown settled for the middle of usability (and the middle is the worst) without taking advantage of the extra benefits Flash had to [...]
item.content:encoded: […] in 99% of computers worldwide. Instead, Srown settled for the middle of usability (and the middle is the worst) without taking advantage of the extra benefits Flash had to […]

item.title: By: Greg
item.dc:creator: Greg
item.description: I'm in the middle of everything :/ Photography, tech skills, design skills.. An endless pit of despair. Start to slack too much and people start to think you are the worst, show off to much and people get false confidence in you thinking your are the best... The middle sucks...
item.content:encoded: I’m in the middle of everything :/ Photography, tech skills, design skills.. An endless pit of despair. Start to slack too much and people start to think you are the worst, show off to much and people get false confidence in you thinking your are the best… The middle sucks…
